channel.title: Luke's Statistics Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Luke's Statistics Blog

item.title: MY FIRST POST
item.description: Hello there, this is my first blog post. I don’t have much to say about this, but I invite you to stay tuned because in the coming days will come out many articles. Also, there will be two categories of post here: Researches about theory (R) Applications / Practice (A) So, keep in mind which one of the two letters the post contains, because it is to specify at a glance its type.
item.content:
Hello there, this is my first blog post. I don’t have much to say about this, but I invite you to stay tuned because in the coming days will come out many articles.

Also, there will be two categories of post here:

  • Researches about theory (R)
  • Applications / Practice (A)

So, keep in mind which one of the two letters the post contains, because it is to specify at a glance its type.

Example:

  • 1_R its a possible title of a post about Research
  • 1_A its a possible title of a post about Applications / Practice

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there if you want to know more about me and the blog, you are in the right place. My name is Luca, I’m a computer engineer and currently a CyberSecurity student at la Sapienza, previously i was a computer engineering student also at la Sapienza. This blog is hosted with GitHub pages and made with Hugo a framework for building websites. The main topic of the blog is statistics (as you can imagine from the title of the website), here i will post all my assigned homework, I hope you will find the research posted here useful.
item.content:
Hi there

if you want to know more about me and the blog, you are in the right place.

My name is Luca, I’m a computer engineer and currently a CyberSecurity student at la Sapienza, previously i was a computer engineering student also at la Sapienza. This blog is hosted with GitHub pages and made with Hugo a framework for building websites. The main topic of the blog is statistics (as you can imagine from the title of the website), here i will post all my assigned homework, I hope you will find the research posted here useful. Also, if you’re interested about my other past projects, I invite you to check out my GitHub.
